column4: Hi, I am having a DVD playback problem.  Any experts in here who can help me a bit?

After updating from 8.04 to 10.04, DVD's no longer playback.  I get a variety of error messages depending upon what application I am trying to use.  libdvdcss4 seems to be working all right.  I can see the generated keys.  There seems to be some other problem.
i'd reinstall the dvd codec package, it may help
do all players act the same?
